attributes.action: allow the sufferers of PCOS laser hair removal on the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some women who suffer from this condition feel isolated and ridiculed because many of them have excess facial and body hair. It is a distressing condition and many do not have the financial standing to be able to afford private treatment. Free treatment on the NHS would be so beneficial.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "allow the sufferers of PCOS laser hair removal on the NHS."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13687.asp

Prime Minister's Office
